item.title: Visualizing the State of the Amsterdam Housing Market
item.description: For this post, I decided to hide the code chunks by default to improve legibility. You can click the Show code-button to expand the code. Introduction I’m at the age where a lot of my peers start thinking about buying a home. It is a major conversation topic around the office, and these conversations are not often filled with optimism and excitement. Oslo is a notoriously expensive city to live in, and the housing market is very tough.
